casebody.data:
BANK OF AMERICA CORPORATION, et al., petitioners,
v.
CITY OF MIAMI, FLORIDA. No. 15-1111. Supreme Court of the United States June 28, 2016.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit granted. The case is *2545consolidated and a total of one hour is allotted for oral argument.
